thread.title: What Mariah Carey gets for a $10,000-a-night Airbnb rental
thread.title_full: What Mariah Carey gets for a $10,000-a-night Airbnb rental - MarketWatch

author: By     Emily Smith
title: What Mariah Carey gets for a $10,000-a-night Airbnb rental
text:
www.airbnb.com A look inside the four-bedroom, four-bath Mediterranean villa located right on the beach. Mariah Carey is soon to be neighbors with moguls Jeffrey Katzenberg, David Geffen, Irving Azoff and Larry Ellison after renting a $10,000-a-night Airbnb on Malibu’s so-called Billionaires’ Beach.
The divorcing mother of two, who’s been performing at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas, has rented a $30 million Airbnb oceanfront estate on pristine Carbon Beach .
The four-bed, four-bath pad offers a living room with fireplace, an outdoor Jacuzzi, a gourmet kitchen, a private master suite on the second level with fireplace, plus a two-room guest cottage.
She’s expected to reside in Malibu with her Australian billionaire beau James Packer and her kids before she jets to Israel for a concert at the end of August.
www.airbnb.com More from MarketWatch
